registration_in_person_disclaimer:
OCP will follow all county, state and federal rules and regulations regarding travel and meetings at the time of the 2021 OCP Global Summit. By clicking this box, you acknowledge and take responsibility for adhering to any and all travel and public participation regulations. Currently (as of August 2, 2021*), international travelers looking to enter California may be required to self-certify whether or not they have received the COVID-19 vaccine. These regulations change regularly, and it is the responsibility of the attendee to research their eligibility to travel to and participate in this event. OCP, FNTECH and Team San Jose are not responsible for any expenses incurred should an attendee be denied entry into the county, state or event, including but not limited to airfare, hotel, meals and event registration fees.

You can visit the San Jose Convention Center travel webpage and/or the California regulations link to see the latest updates.
